ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed! There will be no safe place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Never so, for there will be no escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Certainly not! There will be no place of refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: By no means! there shall be no place of refuge!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But there is nowhere to take refuge:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No indeed! There will be no refuge!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By no means! No place of safety!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, there shall be no (place of) refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No indeed! There is no refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:11] No indeed! — a deterrent against seeking to escape — There is no refuge, no shelter to seek protection in.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Alas! No refuge!) Truly, there is no mountain to shield him from the Fire, nor are there any trees, cover, fortress, refuge or safety for them from Allah.
